full_summary:
**Tender Announcement for Repairs to Laurentian Forestry Center Envelope**
==============================================================

**Project Details**
-------------------

* **Title**: Repairs to Laurentian Forestry Center Envelope
* **Location**: Quebec City
* **Reference Number**: PW-QCM-042-18345
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Solicitation Number**: EE520-230377/A
* **Publication Date**: August 8, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 6, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

**Project Overview**
-------------------

The Public Works and Government Services Canada invites bids for the repair of the limestone envelope and replacement of doors and frames at the Laurentian Forestry Center, located at 1055 Rue du Peps, Quebec City. This project is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Bid Submission Requirements**
-----------------------------

* Bids must be submitted electronically through the Connect service provided by Canada Post.
* A mandatory criterion at closing date requires the submission of bid security.

**Site Visit and Inquiries**
---------------------------

* An optional site visit will be held on August 17, 2022.
* All inquiries and comments regarding this request for proposal must be submitted to Gabriel Fortin-Harvey, Contracting Authority, at gabriel.fortin-harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Security Requirements**
-----------------------

* There are no security requirements applicable to this agreement.

**Languages**
------------

* This project is available in both official languages of Canada.

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* The project delivery date is mentioned above.

You can find the complete tender document on the following pages:

* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/08/55596c9cde289fbbc010e9a98f14df40/ee520-230377_a_-_plans_architechture_-_copie_conforme.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/08/55596c9cde289fbbc010e9a98f14df40/ee520-230377_a_-_plans_architechture_-_copie_conforme.pdf)
* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att
